Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
generations.text: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! With teachers from all over the world, you'll be able to learn any language you desire.

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
generations.text: Looking for a way to improve your language skills? Look no further than LangLang! Our app connects you to teachers from all over the world, so you can get the help you need to improve your language skills. Whether you're looking to learn a new language for school or for travel, LangLang is the perfect solution for you.

text: Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with teachers from all over the world, and learn at your own pace. Looking to learn a new language? LangLang is the perfect app for you! Connect with teachers from all over the world, and learn at your own pace.
